name: Saviour & Destroyer
description:
Made In 72 Hours For The GeoJam | Theme: Pick A Side

Either pick from good side or bad side

Good Side: you gotta save your planet from being destroyed

Bad Side: you gotta destroy the planet

CONTROLS

W-A-S-D OR Arrow Keys - Move

Shift - Dash

P: pause

ESC: menu

Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/mysticgaming306

ui sound from: Creative Commons 0
